TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit StripLine extends System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartElement

summary.span: 表示图表上的带状线。

span.span: Represents the strip lines on a chart.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 条带线或条带，背景带有阴影的固定或自定义的时间间隔中的图表的水平或垂直区域。Strip lines, or strips, are horizontal or vertical ranges that shade the background of a chart in regular or custom intervals. 可以使用条带线：You can use strip lines to: - 改进可读性以便查找图表上的单个值。Improve readability for looking up individual values on the chart. - 读取该图表时分离数据点。Separate data points when reading the chart. - 突出显示定期出现，例如，若要标识周末数据点的日期。Highlight dates that occur at regular intervals, for example, to identify weekend data points. - 突出显示特定的键范围的数据。Highlight a specific key range of data. - 在特定的常量值添加阈值行。Add a threshold line at a specific constant value. 单个对象可以是绘制一次或重复，对于给定的时间间隔。A single object can either be drawn once, or repeatedly, for a given interval. 此操作由控制属性。This action is controlled by the property. 如果值为零分配给属性中，一个条带将绘制线条。When a value of zero is assigned to the property, one strip line will be drawn. 当一个非零值分配给属性，将每个给定时间间隔重复绘制条带线。When a non-zero value is assigned to the property, a strip line will be drawn repeatedly at each given interval. 绘制一个条带线的位置的位置也会影响和条带线的属性。The location where a strip line is drawn is also affected by the and properties of the strip line. 条带线都始终与对象。Strip lines are always associated with an object. 它们可以在设计时和运行的时添加。They can be added at both design time and run time. 若要添加水平或垂直的一行以显示一个阈值，将设置属性的值为 0.0。To add a horizontal or vertical line to display a threshold, set the property to a value of 0.0. 这将导致正在绘制的直线。This will result in a line being drawn. 可以使用，和颜色、 宽度和线条的样式属性。You can use the , and properties for the color, width and style of the line. 没有图表背景属性 (`Back*`) 时使用属性设置为 0.0。No chart background properties (`Back*`) are used when the property is set to 0.0. 使用的条带线，若要将文本与一个条带线相关联的属性。Use the property of the strip line to associate text with a strip line. 可通过控制放置和此文本的方向属性。The placement and orientation of this text can be controlled by the property. 为同一个轴定义了多个条带线，很可能会重叠的条带线。When multiple strip lines are defined for the same axis, it is possible that the strip lines will overlap. Z 顺序对象由它们中的匹配项的顺序对象。The Z-order of objects is determined by their order of occurrence in the object. 这意味着第一; 绘制第一个匹配项第二个匹配项是绘制第二个，依次类推。This means that the first occurrence is drawn first; the second occurrence is drawn second, and so on. 条带线不支持以下图表类型： 饼图、 圆环图、 漏斗图、 棱锥图，卡吉图、 ThreeLineBreak、 点数图、 极坐标图和雷达图。Strip lines are not supported for the following chart types: Pie, Doughnut, Funnel, Pyramid, Kagi, ThreeLineBreak, PointAndFigure, Polar and Radar.

summary.span: 获取或设置带状线的背景色。

span.span: Gets or sets the background color of the strip line.
A structure.
The default color is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以将此属性设置为任何有效的 ARGB （alpha、 红色、 绿色、 蓝色） 值。You can set this property to any valid ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) value. 若要设置带状线的渐变，设置和属性。To set a gradient for the strip line, set the and properties. 如果将此颜色设置为"透明"— 即，将 alpha 值设置为 0-没有颜色将分配给元素的背景。If you set this color to "transparent"—in other words, set the alpha value to 0—no color will be assigned to the background of the element. 因此，在后台将是透明的。As a result, the background will be transparent. 如果属性设置为 0.0，则将绘制一条线和属性将确定的行中，不是此属性的颜色。If the property is set to 0.0, a line will be drawn and the property will determine the color of the line, not this property.

summary.span: 获取或设置带状线的渐变样式。

span.span: Gets or sets the gradient style of the strip line.
A enumeration.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性确定是否图表元素将显示为渐变的方向或渐变，如果使用。The property determines whether a chart element will display a gradient, as well as the orientation of the gradient, if used. 若要使用的渐变颜色：To use gradient colors: - 使用属性来设置主要颜色。Use the property to set the primary color. - 使用属性来设置辅助颜色。Use the property to set the secondary color. - 将此项设置到所需的渐变样式的图表元素的属性。Set this property of the chart element to the desired gradient style. 此属性不适用如果属性设置为值为 0.0。This property is not applicable if the property is set to a value of 0.0.

summary.span: 获取或设置带状线的阴影样式。

span.span: Gets or sets the hatching style of the strip line.
A enumeration.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 阴影图案由纯色背景色和背景上绘制的线条组成。The hatch pattern consists of a solid background color and lines drawn over the background. 设置中的阴影样式使用的两个颜色和属性。The two colors used in the hatch style are set by the and properties. 此属性不适用如果属性设置为值为 0.0。This property is not applicable if the property is set to a value of 0.0.

summary.span: 获取或设置带状线的背景图像。

span.span: Gets or sets the background image of the strip line.

value.span: 一个 值，该值表示图像文件的 URL。

span.span: A value that represents an image file's URL.
The default is an empty string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性定义到许多图表元素的背景图像的路径，是绝对或相对 URL。The property defines a path to a background image for many chart elements, and is an absolute or relative URL. 若要定位此图像，请使用和属性。To position this image, use the and properties. 此外可以指定是否将显示为"透明"映像通过设置一种颜色属性。You can also specify that one color will be displayed by the image as "transparent" by setting the property. 图像可以是任何支持的.NET Framework 中，包括图标的有效图形文件。An image can be any valid graphics file supported by .NET Framework, including icons. 此属性不适用如果属性设置为值为 0.0。This property is not applicable if the property is set to a value of 0.0. 背景图像优先于其他背景属性，如渐变色。Background images take precedence over other background properties, such as gradient colors.

summary.span: 获取或设置背景图像对齐方式。

span.span: Gets or sets the background image alignment.
A enumeration value.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性确定条带线; 的背景图像对齐的方式它是应用的时，才属性设置为。This property determines the alignment of the background image for strip lines; it is only applied when the property is set to . 有关可用的对齐方式的详细信息，请参阅枚举主题。For more information about available alignments, see the enumeration topic.

summary.span: 获取或设置带状线的背景图像的绘制模式。

span.span: Gets or sets the drawing mode of the background image of the strip line.
A integer enumeration.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性确定如何显示该图像;也就是说，平铺，缩放，等等。This property determines how the image is displayed; that is, tiled, scaled, and so forth. 如果缩放图像，它将拉伸以适合边界的条带线。If an image is scaled, it will be stretched to fit within the bounding strip line. 如果图像平铺，则从左上角开始，对其重复绘制。If the image is tiled, it is repeatedly drawn, starting from the top-left corner. 有关可用包装模式的详细信息，请参阅枚举主题。For more information concerning the available wrapping modes, see the enumeration topic. 如果属性设置为，表示绘制图像的位置将由属性设置。If the property is set to , the location where the image is drawn will be determined by the property setting. 此属性不适用如果设置为值为 0.0。This property is not applicable if is set to a value of 0.0.

summary.span: 获取或设置带状线背景的辅助颜色。

span.span: Gets or sets the secondary color of the strip line background.

value.span: 一个 值，该值用于带阴影或渐变填充的背景的辅助颜色。

span.span: A value used for the secondary color of a background with hatching or gradient fill.
The default color is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性确定许多图表对象的辅助背景颜色和渐变颜色在应用时使用。This property determines the secondary background color of many chart objects, and is used when gradient colors are being applied. 可以为任何有效的 ARGB （alpha、 红色、 绿色、 蓝色） 值来设置背景辅助颜色。You can set background secondary color to any valid ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) value. 如果使用阴影，则属性确定的阴影线条的颜色。If hatching is used, the property determines the color of the hatching lines. 若要使用的图表元素背景的渐变颜色：To use gradient colors for the background of a chart element: - 使用属性来设置主要颜色。Use the property to set the primary color. - 使用此属性来设置辅助颜色。Use this property to set the secondary color. - 设置属性设置为所需的渐变样式。Set the property to the desired gradient style. 此属性不适用如果属性设置为值为 0.0。This property is not applicable if the property is set to a value of 0.0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以将间隔类型设置为，类型取决于在这种情况下： 所绘制的 X 值或 Y 值的类型对象，具体取决于哪个轴对象属于 — 和轴刻度。Interval types can be set to , in which case the type depends on: the X-value or Y-value types of the plotted objects—depending on which axis the objects belong to—and the axis scale. 属性确定何种频率绘制条带或线条。The property determines how often a strip or line is drawn.

span.span: Gets or sets the width of a strip line.

value.span: 一个 值，该值确定是绘制条带还是线条。

span.span: A value that determines whether a strip or a line is drawn.
The default value is 0.0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不能设置此属性为一个值小于零，否则将引发异常。This property cannot be set to a value less than zero, otherwise an exception will be raised. 如果设置为 0.0 会导致所绘制; 的行将使用此行，和属性设置为其颜色、 宽度和样式。A setting of 0.0 will result in a line being drawn; this line will use the , and property settings for its color, width and style. 没有任何`Back*`使用此类中的属性时的值为 0.0。None of the `Back*` properties in this class are utilized when the value of is 0.0. 如果您设置属性的值大于零，将创建条带。If you set the property to a value greater than zero, a strip will be created. ，并属性仅适用于的边框的条带; 所有`Back*`属性然后用于条带的背景属性。The , and properties only apply to the border of the strip; all of the `Back*` properties are then used for the background properties of the strip. 如果的值属性大于 0.0，单位由相关轴刻度。If the value of the property is greater than 0.0, the units are determined by the relevant axis scale.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::DateTimeIntervalType StripWidthType { System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::DateTimeIntervalType get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::DateTimeIntervalType value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置 属性的度量单位。

span.span: Gets or sets the unit of measurement for the property.

value.span: 一个 枚举值，该值指示宽度类型。

span.span: A enumeration value that indicates the width type.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性确定所使用的单位属性。This property determines the units used for the property. 例如，若要设置的条带线来表示"一周"，您可以将此属性设置并设置属性设置为一个 (1.0)。For example, to set a strip line to represent "one week", you could set this property to and set the property to one (1.0). 您可以更改中的此属性的值到值时使用相关轴刻度值。You can change the value of this property from to a value when the relevant axis scale uses a value.

span.span: A value that represents the text of a strip line.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性将文本添加到一个条带线。Use this property to add text to a strip line.

summary.span: 获取或设置文本方向。

span.span: Gets or sets the text orientation.

value.span: 一个 值，该值表示文本方向的对齐方式。

span.span: A value that represents the alignment of the text orientation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当此属性设置为值，文本的方向基于图表类型。When this property is set to a value of , the text is oriented based on the chart type. 对于所有 X，Y 图表类型而非栏中，x 轴条带线的文本是面向水平方向从左到右底部的条带线。For all X-Y chart types other than Bar, X-axis strip line text is oriented horizontally from left to right on the bottom of the strip line. 对于条形图，x 轴带状线文本的方向垂直方向从上到下右侧的条带线。For Bar charts, X-axis strip line text is oriented vertically from top to bottom to the right of the strip line.
